title: Lakshmi Kasu Mala Pendant - A Divine Adornment
materials: Natural Rubies (Ruby-0.30). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This exquisite pendant showcases Goddess Lakshmi seated in a lotus posture, meticulously handcrafted with fine detailing using traditional Nakshi work techniques. The deity is surrounded by an ornate floral frame studded with sparkling diamonds. The pendant is finished with antique finish. Small rubies adorn the top and bottom providing a touch of color and enhancing the overall design.
colors: Predominantly gold with bright white diamonds and a subtle pop of red from the rubies. A classic and auspicious South Indian color palette.
occasions: Ideal for auspicious occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
and religious ceremonies. It makes a cherished heirloom piece.
description: Embrace divine blessings with this meticulously crafted Lakshmi pendant. The traditional Nakshi work, combined with the brilliance of diamonds and the auspiciousness of rubies, creates a piece that is both aesthetically stunning and spiritually significant. The high-quality gold and gemstones ensure its lasting value and beauty. A perfect blend of tradition and elegance.
